channel.title: [PICS]Webclient Error[/PICS]
channel.description:
I followed Rics WebClient tutorial and did exactly what he said and I keep getting this error When I did the compiling right before I jarred it, it compiled fine, no errors
First it says "Client Updated - Please Reload Client" [img]http://neroscape.com/clientupdated.jpg[/img]
Then it says "Connection Error - Retrying in (And counts down from 60 to 1 seconds.)" [img]http://neroscape.com/retryin.jpg[/img]
Now what do I do? Is there any way to fix this? Please help! I've been working on this for dayyys even look at all my postxD
Sincerely, Fillost

item.title: [PICS]Webclient Error[/PICS]
item.dc:creator: @Fillost Fillost
item.description:
@Fillost wrote:

I_Hybrid_I:

Put the cache in your C: Drive

[quote=“eballer48, post:9, topic:414733”][quote author=Fillost link=topic=516693.msg3751658#msg3751658 date=1316064580]
I followed Rics WebClient tutorial and did exactly what he said and I keep getting this error
When I did the compiling right before I jarred it, it compiled fine, no errors

First it says “Client Updated - Please Reload Client”

Then it says “Connection Error - Retrying in (And counts down from 60 to 1 seconds.)”

Now what do I do? Is there any way to fix this?
Please help! I’ve been working on this for dayyys even look at all my postx
Sincerely,

Fillost

[/quote]

Zipped your cache wrong bro. Go into the folder highlight all file rift click add to archive change to .zip not .rar (make sure your not just right clicking on folder add to archive)[/quote]

I’ll give it a shot, I zipped my cache wrong the first time but then I remade into a zip, and I have the cache in my C: drive, it doesn’t make a difference:\

Read full topic

item.title: [PICS]Webclient Error[/PICS]

[quote=“Fillost, post:1, topic:414733”]I followed Rics WebClient tutorial and did exactly what he said and I keep getting this error
When I did the compiling right before I jarred it, it compiled fine, no errors

First it says “Client Updated - Please Reload Client”

Then it says “Connection Error - Retrying in (And counts down from 60 to 1 seconds.)”

Now what do I do? Is there any way to fix this?
Please help! I’ve been working on this for dayyys even look at all my postx
Sincerely,

Fillost[/quote]

Zipped your cache wrong bro. Go into the folder highlight all file rift click add to archive change to .zip not .rar (make sure your not just right clicking on folder add to archive)
